body:
Previous implementation was copying GROMACS package with some modifications.

New implementation inherits from GROMACS package making it more readable. What is more important, there is no need to keep synchronizing it with normal GROMACS package.

In case the list of changes is not readable, it is the same approach as here https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/26902/files#diff-f72fa5c72c640d4c85323f4e1288398c35bfd9af835385e7236c04729919c1da
title: gromacs-chain-coordinate: inherit from gromacs package
